reviewText:
A truly ridiculous point & click adventure game, which isn't a bad thing at all.  Fans of the genre will find a lot of novelty here, as the game takes some creative risks you don't see very often.  Unexpected themes include oddly-child-friendly  casual nudity, existential/societal angst, meaningful playing at dress-up, and amateur planetary exodus.

This sounds like nonsense, and it is, but it all comes together into a package that works surprisingly well.

If you don't agree, at least there will be plenty of marshmallows.  Go for it!

reviewText:
Weird game, interesting plot and original presentation with some funny moments.
Puzzles are very easy and art style is , well, different.
A just think it's too short, not even 2 hours to reach the end.
I think it's worth a try for people seeking something different but be weary that it reaches the conclusion fast.
